code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TermoService}from'../services/api';import'./UrlModal.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UrlModal=_ref=>{let{termoId,onClose}=_ref;const[copied,setCopied]=useState(false);const url=TermoService.gerarLinkAssinatura(termoId);const handleCopyUrl=async()=>{try{await navigator.clipboard.writeText(url);setCopied(true);setTimeout(()=>setCopied(false),3000);}catch(err){console.error('Erro ao copiar URL:',err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Link para Assinatura"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"modal-description",children:"Compartilhe este link com o usu\xE1rio para que ele possa assinar o documento digitalmente."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"url-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:url,readOnly:true,className:"url-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCopyUrl,className:`copy-button ${copied?'copied':''}`,children:copied?'Copiado ✅ ':'Copiar'})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-footer"})]})});};export default UrlModal;
